content.rendered:
THE REVOLUTION HAS BEGUN


Design and functionality come together.
Performance and elegance come together.
Tricolore is born, the new enduro e-mtb made by Moto Parilla.

  • TAKE EVERY ROUTE

  • DISCOVER THE THREE VERSIONS

  • Monocoque carbon fiber frame

    Made in Italy from a single mold

Design vs functionality

The innovative and avant-garde curves make Tricolore a versatile vehicle for any occasion.
It is ideal for long hikes through any terrain and in any weather conditions. The suspension system, the excellent weight balance and the compactness of the vehicle make the Tricolore easy to handle even in the most technical and difficult single tracks, while the autonomy, power and torque of the powertrain system will allow you to pedal even the steepest and longest climbs. .

  • INTEGRATED LIGHTS

    Innovative lighting system created for each use.

Made in Italy

Entirely made in Italy, from carbon fiber to aluminum finishes.
A true work of art.

MCUSTOM PROJECT

Find out how far the Moto Parilla team can go, configure your personal Tricolore by choosing from all the components present on the standard versions, and more.
Create your own unique and unrepeatable graphics.

  • Contact form
  • TRICOLORE MX
  • TRICOLORE MR
  • TRICOLORE M
  • Condividi su Facebook
  • Condividi su Twitter
  • Condividi su WhatsApp
  • Condividi su Pinterest
  • Condividi su LinkedIn
  • Condividi su Tumblr
  • Condividi su Vk
  • Condividi su Reddit
  • Condividi attraverso Mail

REQUESTS AND ORDERS

Use the form below to send us your request, whether it is a request for information or a purchase request. You will be contacted and in the event of a purchase request we will find the best solution, both in economic and logistical terms.





    TrilixCarbonTricoloreAccessoriesAltro
